#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
   int n,m,t,p,s,q;
   scanf("%d",&t);
   while(t--)
   {
       scanf("%d%d%d%d%d",&n,&m,&s,&p,&q);
       int tmp1 =0;
       int tmp2 =0;
       int cnt = 0;
       for(int i=1; i<=s; i++)
       {
           if(tmp1 + p < m)
            tmp1 += p;
           else
            tmp1 = m + (tmp1 + p - m)% (n-m+1);

           if(tmp2 + q < m)
                tmp2 += q;
           else
            tmp2 = m + (tmp2 + q - m)%(n-m+1);

           if(tmp2 == tmp1)
            cnt++;
       }
       printf("%d\n",cnt);
   }
  return 0;
}
